citation_details.title: Beyond Letters: Optimal Transport as a Model for Sub-Letter Orthographic Processing
citation_details.author: JE Taylor, R Sinn, C Iaia, CJ Fiebach
citation_details.abstract: Letter processing plays a key role in visual word recognition. However, word recognition  models typically overlook or greatly simplify early perceptual processes of letter recognition. We
citation_details.short_author: JE Taylor, R Sinn, C Iaia, CJ Fiebach
